sentences.english: You know who was in town this weekend, went to a Yankee game?
sentences.chinese: 你們知道今天誰進城看洋基隊比賽了嗎？

sentences.english: The New York Yankees are a team possessed.
sentences.chinese: 洋基隊現在整隊都像著了魔。

sentences.english: In nineteen twenty-one, the Yankees' manager suspended Ruth from playing.
sentences.chinese: 在一九二一年，洋基隊的經理暫停播放露絲。

sentences.english: Wang is the dark horse for Yankees this year.
sentences.chinese: 王建民是今年洋基隊的黑馬。

sentences.english: Bernie Williams apparently will not attend spring training with the New York Yankees.
sentences.chinese: 威廉斯可能不會和紐約洋基隊一起春訓。

sentences.english: He went on to manage the Yankees and the Mets.
sentences.chinese: 之後他繼續管理了紐約洋基隊和大都會隊。

sentences.english: The Yankees have entered into a contract with the Chinese Baseball Association to help develop players.
sentences.chinese: 洋基隊與中國棒球協會簽約，幫助培養中國棒球手。
